Bwiinguzi bwamu Bbaibbele
Ibbaibbele talibwaambi buzuba mbwaakazyalwa Jesu, alimwi kunyina mpolyaamba kuti katusekelela kuzyalwa kwakwe. Mabbuku aa McClintock a Strong’s Cyclopedia aamba kuti: “Leza kunyina natulailila kusekelela Kkilisimasi, alimwi Kkilisimasi tayaambidwe mu [Cizuminano Cipya].
”
Muciindi caboobo, kulanga-langa mboyakatalika Kkilisimasi kwayubununa kuti yakatalikila mubukombi bwakubeja. Bbaibbele litondezya kuti tulamunyemya Leza kuti twasola kumukomba munzila njatayandi.
Mboya
... 
zuba oobu. Basololi bazikombelo ambweni bakasala buzuba oobu kutegwa kabweendelana amapobwe aabukombi bwakubeja aakali kucitwa lyamupeyo, eelyo zuba nolitalika kubala kapati.
Kupana zipego, kupobola: Bbuku lya Encyclopedia Americana lyaamba kuti : “
Pobwe lyabana Roma litegwa Saturnalia, ndyobasekelela akati kamwezi wa December, ndelyakaba cikozyanisyo cabunji bwazilengwa zyakusekelela Kkilisimasi. Mucikozyanyo, kupobwe eeli, nkokwakazwa kupobola, kupana zipego, alimwi akuyasya nkendulu.
” Bbuku
...
mwi akutanda myuuya mibi.Mistletoe, holly: “
Ba Druid bakali kwaamba kuti cisamu ca mistletoe cakajisi nguzu zyamasalamuzi. Cisamu ca holly cakali kukombwa kusyomezya kuti zuba liyoojoka.
”—The Encyclopedia Americana. Cisamu ca Kkilisimasi: “
Cilengwa cakukomba zisamu, icakadumide kubana Europe batakali Banakristo, cakazumanana nibakaba Banakristo.
” Nzila imwi yakukomba zisamu iiciliko asunu, ncilengwa “cakubikka cisamu ca Yule kumanjililo naa muŋanda ciindi camupeyo.
”—Encyclopædia Britannica.

MWIYA WA MU BIBLE: “Su muntu e na kilumbu na ungi efwileneeyi lusa kwi muntu na muntu bu bi nufwile Yehowa lusa . . . kitaayi byaa-mumune, anwe namu.”—Beena-Kolose 3:13.
Abipatuula kinyi? Mu Bible, mulwisho wi bu ebaasa na kufwila lusa abekupwandikisha bu kufuta ebaasa. (Luuka 11:4) Ungi mukanda awamba’shi kishima kya mu kiina Greeke kyabadi baluule bu “kwifwileena lusa” akileesha “kulekyela ebaasa kushi kwidikyenda.” Byabya, nsaa yatufwila muntu mwitulwishishe lusa, atumulekyeela kitungo kya ku
... 
 kabingilo ku “kilumbu.”
Ukii na muulo lelo uno su? Bu byatudi bantu bakutwe kupwidika, atwe booso atulwishaa. (Beena-Looma 3:23) Atufwilaa bangi lusa, mwanda atukekala namu na lukalo bwashi bangi betufwile lusa. Na dingi, patufwila bangi lusa, abitukwasha atwe banabeene. Mu kipaso kinyi?
Patushala na nsungu na kulamiina muntu—kushii kumufwila lusa—atwikyengyesha atwe banabeene kwishimba. Byabya binangu bibubi mbilombeene kwitukutshishwa muloo, kupeelesha mafuku a muwa wetu na kwitukyengyesha. M
...
luleesha’shi: “Myanda yabadi batundule binobino ayileesha kwipusheena pankatshi pa nsungu na mushikwa na maladi a binangu na ingi mikumbo.”
Kukatusha byabya, kwi miloo ibungi yatupete pa kufwila bangi lusa. Mwanda, patukitshi byabya, atulama buumune na butaale na kulama kipwano kyetu na bangi. Mwanda wi na muulo ukata kukila byabya byoso, atwambula kileshesho ky’Efile Mukulu afwilaa bantu abelanga kwishimba milwisho yaabo na etutekye bwa kukita namu bimumune.—Maako 11:25; Beena-Efeeze 4:32; 5:1.

Ilyo Mose ali pa Lupili lwa Sinai, Yehova amwebele ukukuula icikuulwa icaibela ico baleita abati icikuulwa ca mushilo, umo abena Israele baali no kulapepela Lesa. Abena Israele baali no kulasenda icikuulwa ca mushilo konse uko baya.
Yehova atile: ‘Eba abantu bapeele ubupe pa kuti bakuule icikuulwa ca mushilo.’ Abena Israele balitwele golde, silfere, umukuba, amabwe ayasuma sana ne fibekobeko. Na kabili balitwele insalu ishisuma, impapa sha nama e lyo ne fintu fimbi. Balitwele ifintu ifingi sana 
... 
tule wa Mushilo Nga Nshi e mwali icipao ca cipangano, bacipangile ne fimuti fya mushita na golde. Mu Muputule wa Mushilo babikilemo ilampi ilya golde, itebulo, ne ciipailo apo baleocela ifyanunkila. Mu lubansa lwa cikuulwa ca mushilo mwali ica kubikamo amenshi ico bapangiile no mukuba ne ciipailo icikalamba. Icipao ca cipangano calelenga abena Israele baleibukisha ifyo balaile Yehova. Bushe icipangano walicishiba? Icipangano bulayo ubwaibela.
Yehova asalile Aarone na bana bakwe ukuba bashimapepo
...
ushilo, no bukata bwa kwa Yehova bwaiswile mu cikuulwa ca mushilo. Ikumbi nga talimine pa cikuulwa ca mushilo, abena Israele tabalefuma pa cifulo apo bali. Lelo ikumbi nga lyaima, baleima no kutampa ukwenda. Balepangulula icikuulwa ca mushilo no kukonka ukwaleya ikumbi.
“E lyo naumfwile ishiwi ilikalamba ukufuma ku cipuna ca bufumu lileti: ‘Moneni! Itenti lya kwa Lesa lili pamo na bantunse, kabili akekala pamo na bo, kabili bakaba abantu bakwe. Na Lesa umwine akaba pamo na bo.’”—Ukusokolola 21:3

Pantu paa pakalanga ivintu ivipya vino twisilepo likwene pa jw.org. Pakuti muzane ya magazini apya, mabuku, ni mpapulo zyuze, yulini pa Ncende ya mpapulo.
MAVIDYO AALIPO
Icitemwiko icisisila cino umwanaci umwina syulamu wakweti kuli kacema calondololwa ukuti i ‘cimbilimbili cakwe Jah.’ Nomba u mulandu ci uno cayela vivyo?
KULONDELA MASUNDE AMULI BAIBO
Ya Tom yalondesyanga sana ukuzumila muli Leza nomba izile yapata imipepele ni milimo iyaombwangamo iitaakweti upiliulo. Uzye ukusambilila Baibo kwayazwile uli ukumanya Leza nu kumutaila?
UKUSIMIKILA UKU NCENDE UKUKAZANWA ANTU AINGI
Ilolelini vino umulimo wa kusimikila ukuombwa umu nzila iiyeele mu Manhattan, ku New York, na vino umulimo uu ukulenga ukuti antu yapokako impapulo izikalanda pali Baibo.
UKUSIMIKILA UKU NCENDE UKUKAZANWA ANTU AINGI
Amu lupwa lumwi yakulondolola vino ukusimikila ilandwe lisuma ku cifulo icisisimikilwako sana kwayazwa ukutemwana.

HENA ilibonya kuba inzoka ini eeyo izambaidwe acisamu? Peepe. Inzoka eeyi njamukuba. Jehova wakaambila Musa kwiibikka acisamu kutegwa bantu kabailanga akuzumanana kupona. Pele nzoka zimwi zili ansi ninzoka nconzyo. Zyabaluma bantu akubapa kuciswa. Hena ulicizyi ncocili boobo?
Nkaambo kakuti bana Isilayeli baamba twaambo tutali kabotu kuli Jehova akuli Musa. Batongooka ategwa: ‘Ino ncinzi ncowakatuzwisyila mu Ijipiti akuti tuzyi kufwide munkanda muno? Taku cakulya naaba meenda. Twalimvwa kulya ma
... 
tu bakali kulumwa, bakali kwiilanga inzoka yamukuba alimwi bakali kupona.
Kuli ciiyo ncotukonzya kwiiya kuli ceeci. Toonse munzila iimwi tuli mbuli bana Isilayeli bakalumwa nzoka eezyo. Toonse tulafwa! Langa buyo munyika ulabona kwaamba kuti bantu balacembala, balaciswa akufwa. Eeci cili boobu akaambo kakuti musankwa amukaintu bakutaanguna Adamu a Eva bakamuzangila Jehova, aboobo toonse tuli bana babo. Pele Jehova wabamba nzila kutegwa katupona kukabe akutamani.
Jehova wakatuma Mwana wakwe Jesu 
...
cotukonzya kwiiya kumakani aaya?
Mibuzyo aimwi
- Bala Myeelwe 21:4-9.
Nkucenjezyegwa kuli buti swebo nkotujisi twalanga bana Isilayeli mbobakatongooka Jehova mbwaakali kubalanganya? (My. 21:5, 6; Balo. 2:4)
Kwamyaanda yamyaka yakaccilila, ino mbuti bana Isilayeli mbobakaibelesya inzoka yamukuba, alimwi nintaamu nzi Mwami Hezekiya njaakabweza? (My. 21:9; 2 Bam. 18:1-4)
- Bala Johane 3:14, 15.
Mbuti kubikkwa kwanzoka yamukuba acisamu mbocitondezya kujaigwa kwa Jesu Kristo? (Gal. 3:13; 1 Pita 2:24)

1, 2. Nongwa yafiki tukuyoba ukuti ulwiputo kyabupe kya pamwanya, kangi nongwa yafiki tukulondiwa ukumanya isi iBaibolo likuyoba pa fundo iyi?
IKISU kyapasi kinandi fiyo pakufwanikisya nifindu fingi ifi fipeliwe. Linga Yehova ikuketa pakisu, ikuketa ifikolo fyosa ifya bandu bo katonyelo ka misi ukufuma mu ndeko. (Salimo 115:15; Yesaya 40:15) Nalinga twebandu tuli banandi fiyo pakufwanikisya nifindu ifi fipeliwe, ilemba lya Salimo 145:18, 19 likuyoba likuti: ‘Yehova ali pipi itolo kuli bosa aba b
... 
li, pamusi pamo pakilo. Linga tukwiputa kwa Yehova, tuyeghe nulusubilo ukuti ikuya pakupilika inyiputo syitu nalinga abandu abangi bakabaghila ukupilika.—Nehemiya 2:1-6.
11. Ngimba findu fiki ifi tubaghile ukunsuma Yehova?
11 Ngimba tukulondiwa ukusuma ifindu fiki? Tubaghile ukwiputila filifyosa ifi Yehova ikwitikisya. IBaibolo likuyoba ukuti: ‘Aka linga tukusuma ukufwana nubwighane bwake, ikutupilika.’ (1 Yohani 5:14) Ngimba tubaghile ukuyoba nawe ifindu ifya twibene? Ena. Linga tukuyoba na Yeh
...
yi tukalinong’onilepo. Ikifwanikisyo, akabalilo kamo tubaghile ukusuma ukuti atutule pa ndamyo iyi twaghene nayo, loli Umwene m’malo mwakusosyapo indamyo lumo abaghile ukutupa amaka ghakuti ghatutule ukwifimbilisya.—Belenga Bafilipi 4:13.
20. Nongwa yafiki twiputeghe kwa Yehova pipipipi?
20 Ukwiputa kwa Kyala lusako lunywamu fiyo! Tusimikisyeghe ukuti ikupilika linga tukwiputa. (Salimo 145:18) Linga tukwiputa pipipipi kwa Yehova ukufuma pasi pa ndumbula, ubumanyani bwitu nu Mwene bukuya bwamaka.

1. Sena nshila shonse shakupaila shaina?
Mukupaila konse kuli bantu baina. Makani aina nakwamba eti Lesa ukute kubabona bantu bonse aba kayi ukute kubashako mano. Koma cintu caipa maningi nicakwamba eti kupaila nakumo bakute kukusebensesha kwamba eti bainse bintu byaipa. (2 Akorinto 4:3, 4; 11:13-15) Makani naamo aleshenga eti kupaila nakumo kukute kumanta lubasu munkondo kayi nemukupensha bana bang’ana-bang’ana. Makani aya akute kubacima bantu bakute kushoma Lesa mucancine-ncine.—Belengani Mate
... 
a yamucindi ca Nowa. Lino-lino, Lesa nakafunyepo kupaila kwabubepeshi kayi kukute kupensha bantu.—Belengani Chivumbulutso 17:1, 2, 5, 16, 17; 18:8.
Kuli makani aina mangi. Yehova ucibayeya bantu baina moyo bakute kucanika mukupaila kwabubepeshi pacishi conse. Ukute kubakuwa bantu bamushobo uyu kupitila mukubayisha cancine-ncine.—Belengani Mika 4:2, 5.
3. Inga bantu baina moyo belela kwinsa cani?
Yehova ukute kubashako mano bantu basuna bintu byaina kayi byancine-ncine. Ukute kubaambila eti bacil
...
kabe banendi, nimukabe umo wabeshikupaila bakendi, kayi nimukacane buyumi butapu.—Belengani Maliko 10:29, 30; 2 Akorinto 6:17, 18.
4. Inga Lesa nakalete aconi kukondwa pacishi conse capanshi?
Bomboloshi bwabeshikupaila kwabubepeshi nimakani aina. Bupingushi ubu nibukafunyepo mapensho pacishi conse capanshi. Kupaila kwabubepeshi nteti kukanyonganye bantu na kubapansanya. Bantu bonse beshi bakacanikeko cindi ico nibakekatane mukupaila Lesa wancine-ncine.—Belengani Chivumbulutso 18:20, 21; 21:3, 4.

Mangwalo ndibbwe amusemo walusyomo lwa bana Kristu ooyo uutakonzyi kwaandauka nokuba kubaa lwaanzi pe. Njenzila yini eeyo Yahuwah njaakayoyela muya Wakwe, iitozya kubuumi butamani. Boonse aabo basyomeka mumyoyo yabo, kabatandila Yahuwah a bululami Bakwe, ciyooba cilengwa cabo kubala Bbaibbele akuyobozya majwi aabuumi mumizeezo yabo. Kumuka kubala nokuba kutonkela ambali kubala jwi lyokwa Yahuwah, inga caambilizya kusala lufu atalaa buumi. Inzya ncintu cilemu boobo, nkaambo kuti swebo twaleka kwe
... 
ede kuponena acinkwa calo, pele weelede kuponena amajwi oonse aazwa kumulomo wa Yahuwah.’ ” Mpoonya Diabolosi wakaunka anguwe kumunzi uusalala, waakumwiimika atala abwaanda bwakazingulukide tempele akumwaambila kuti: “Ikuti naa uli mwana wa Yahuwah, koliwaala ansi, nkaambo kulilembedwe kuti: ‘Uyoolailila bangelo bakwe kutegwa bakakukwabilile, alimwi bayookutemba amaanza aabo kutegwa utakabi nolinontola kubbwe.’ ” Yahushua wakamwiingula kuti: “Alimwi kulilembedwe kuti: ‘Utasunki Yahuwah Leza wako
...
ila sibwiinga bati, ‘Mwami, Mwami tujulile.’ Walo wakabaingula kuti, ‘Ncobeni, nsimwizi pe.’”Yahushua wakati, “Mulindilile nkaambo tamuzi ciindi Mwanaa Muntu nayooboola.” (Mateyo 25:1-13)
Toonse, kwiinda muluzyalo lwa Taata, atulyaabe kubala abuzuba ijwi Lyakwe lipa buumi , kutegwa swebo tukakonzye amoyo uusyomeka kwaamba mbuli Joobo kuti,
Kunyina pe Ime neekadilika musyule kuzwa kumulawo wamulomo wakwe; Ime ndakalanganya majwi aamulomo wakwe kuti alainda kuyandika kwiinda cakulya. (Joobo 23:12)

i yelivafiche. 17Vanyalukolo, ukwileka kwetu na nyenye kwe kwa lusika ludodo hela, kangi ukwileka uko kwe kwa muvili hela na siwita kwa Umuhe. Kunyima kwa kukita kidibwa kya kitentekyesho, pabadi mushale na batumibwa mu kadimbo ka kwiyilu, Yesu badi mwibanyingishe shi: “Mashimba eenu taapampakananga; anukumiina mwi Efile Mukulu, nkumiineeyi namu n’ami naamu.”—Yowano 13:36; 14:1.
Yesu bapeele balongi baye basha lulamato kabingilo ka kupela kupampana bwa kwenda kwaye p’aye kwibalungula shi: “Mu nshibo ya Yaaya, mwi bishaaleelo biibungi. . . . Pangikala mwende mu kwinulumbulwila yanka, naakalukiila mu kwinwata, bwa’shi kwandji nukeekale n
... 
gyeleshi bikile bibakitshine nya. Abadi na kya kulungula mukandu wibuwa munda mwa kipindji ki bula mu ma mbalo ebungi na kwi bantu bebungi.
Nsaa ayende Yesu, tebalekye basumbushene nya, mwanda bebalayile shi: “Su nwateka kantu mwishina dyande, neekakumbasha.” Bakwile dingi shi: “Ami, naatekye Yaaya bwa’shi aakeenutumine ungi mukwashi ashaala neenu looso, . . . nyi nkikudi kiselele kya biinyibiinyi.” (Yowano 14:14, 16, 17) Badi mwibashinkamishe shi abakapete kikudi kiselele bu mukwashi. Abadi bek
...
dji kapela. Yesu bambile shi: “Nfumu a pano pa nsenga kwet’afiki. Eyendo, tee na matalwa kwandi nya.” (Yowano 14:30) Diabulu badi na ngobesha ya kutwela munda mwa Yuudase bwa kumukunkusha. Anka Yesu tabadi na kubofula sunga nkupela bwa shi Satana amutakule mu kusumbushena Efile Mukulu nya. Na Diabulu tabadya kukitshisha bwa shi Yesu afwe bwa looso nya. Bwakinyi? Yesu akula shi: “Naakitshi muyiile bibadi Yaaya munfundjile.” Badi mushinkamishe shi Nshaye akyebe kumusangusha ku bafwe.—Yowano 14:31.

“Ndukumukombeteleni ati mumfwe, eli nakulabila.”—JOBO 42:4.
INYIMBO: 113, 114
1-3. (a) Mba nindo ukulanguluka kwa baYawe ne mulaka wabo fipusanineko ne fya bantunshi? (b) Findo twakwambaalapo muli cicino iciputusha?
BAYAWE baalukufwaya bambi ukuba ne mweo kabili abasangalele. Popele, baalilengele inkalamba ne bantunshi. (Amasamo 36:9; 1 Timote 1:11) BaYawe balitangiile ukulenga woyo intangishi Yoane ita ati “Ishiwi.” (Yoane 1:1; Ukufisulula 3:14) BaYawe balukwambaala na lyelyo Ishiwi, baYesu, ne
... 
u abengi baliakopolweleko. Amashiwi abaLesa alyalwilwe na mu milaka imbi iingi. Ili papitile imyaka 400 ukufuma apa baYesu bafyalilwe, John Chrysostom alilabiile ati ifi baYesu balukusambisha fyalyalwilwe mu milaka ingi iili koti milaka ya baShilya, abaIjipiti, aba ku India, abaPasai, aba ku Etiopia, ne milaka ya bantu bambi lukoso.
12. Kani abantu bambi baalyeseshe shani ukonaala Baibolo?
12 Ukufuma lukoso ne kale, kwali abalukonaala Baibolo, abalukupensha abalukwalula Baibolo ne kuipeela ku ba
...
e kumfwa. Mu ciputusha cakonkapo, tukambaala ifingi pali yiyi Baibolo. Nakabili, tukambaala na fyefyo iyi Baibolo ilukwalulwa mu milaka na imbi lukoso.
^ par. 6 Septuagint ilaalula ati “amakumi asanu na abili.” Cilaboneka koti ukwalula iyi Baibolo kwalitatikile imyaka 300 ili baYesu tabangafyalwa. Kabili kwaalishilile ili papitile imyaka 150. Iyi Baibolo icindeme na pali bubuno bukumo ni pakuti ilofwako abasambilila pa fya mu Baibolo ukumfwisha amashiwi aciEbeya aakosele na Baibolo yonse lukoso.

Tujisi makani aayinda kubota ngotuyanda kwaabana anduwe mukwabo!
Kutegwa ujane buumi butamani, yebo weelede kululama mbweenya mbuli Yahushua mbwaluleme. Eeci caambilizya kuti yebo weelede kubamba mulawo ookwa Yahuwah mbweenya mbuli Nguwe mbwaakacita: kululamika milawo yoonse. Kwiina kuleyaleya. Kwiina kulezya. Mubukkwene.
Inzya. Oobu mbobubotu bwamakani aaya. Nkaambo, masimpe eeni ngakuti, yebo tokonzyi kucita cintu eeci.
Aswebo tatukonzyi kucicita cintu eeci mubukkwene pe. Kunyina muntu uunga w
... 
i cinyonyoono cicitwa kokanzide amaanu aakkwene kucicita. Kunyina muntu wakeempwa ncobeni uunga wazumanana kucita cinyonyoono cizyibidwe.
Eelyo moza wa Yahuwah nuulela mukati ka moyo wamuntu, muntu uusyoma ulanganya cinyonyoono mbweenya mbuli Yahuwah mbwacilanganya. Mukuya kwaciindi, inga watalika kuyungizya kucimwa cinyonyoono, eeco caandaanya muya wamuntu kuzwa kuli Yahuwah. Paulu wakapandulula mbocicitika eeci, kaamba kuti: “Kuzwa ono cinyonyoono tacili aanguzu kulindinywe, nkaambo ceendelezy
...
ne! Ndamwaambila makani aasisidwe. Tatukooyoofwa toonse pe, pele toonse tuyoosandulwa, mukaindi kaniini buyo mukulaba kwaliso, waakulila mweembo. Nkaambo mweembo uyoolila, nkabela bafu bayoobuka amibili iitafwi, eelyo aswebo tuyoosanduka. Nkaambo mubili ooyu uubola uleelede kusanduka kuba uutaboli, mubili ooyu uufwa uleelede kusanduka kuba uutafwi. (Kobala 1 Bakolinto 15:50-53, KJV.)
Kotambula cipego ca lufutuko sunu! Kukkomana akuzunda kulindila boonse aabo batambula bululami kwiinda mulusyomo.

Tamba kala, Yehova usakanga kisaka ne kisaka kushikatyila pamo mwanda wa kuningisha kipwano kyabo na Leza ne kuningisha kipwano kyabo abo bene. (Kupituluka 6:6, 7) O mwanda Batumoni ba Yehova batoñanga’ko kyolwa kimo yenga ne yenga kya kutōtela pamo mu kisaka
Kino kyo kitatyi kya kufwena pabwipi na Yehova. “Fwenai kudi Leza, nandi ukemufwena.” (Yakoba 4:8) Tuyukanga Yehova biyampe shi twifunda myanda mivule ya bumuntu bwandi ne bilongwa byandi mu Kinenwa kyandi kisonekwe. Muswelo upēla wa kushil
... 
bya butangi bikokeja kwabanibwa ku muntu ne muntu mu kisaka, kupwa ke mwisambila pa milangwe yomwefunda mu Bisonekwa.

KITEBA KYA MULAMI—KYA KWIFUNDA Kweji 6 2020
Mu ino nimelo mudi bishinte bya kwifunda tamba 3-30 Kweji 8, 2020.
Kishinte kya kwifunda 23: 3-9 Kweji 8, 2020. Le i mwanda’ka wa mvubu utala bipangwa byonso bya ñeni? Le i bika biulengeje wikale wa mvubu bininge, ne i bika byotufwaninwe kulonga mu uno mwanda? Kuyuka malondololo a bino bipangujo ne bikwabo pamo bwa bino, kuketukwasha tuningije kipwano kyotupwene na Yehova.
Kishinte kya kwifunda 24: 10-16 Kweji 8, 2020. Mu kino kishinte tusa kwisambila’mo pa milombelo ya Mulopwe Davida ilembelwe mu Ñimbo ya Mitōto 86:11, 12. Le kutyina dijina dya Yehova kushintulula bika? Mwanda waka tufwaninwe kwakamwa dino dijina dikatakata? Le kutyina Leza kubwanya kwitukinga namani tukomene matompo?
Kishinte kya kwifunda 25: 17-23 Kweji 8, 2020. Mwanda waka bantu bamo ke bengidile Yehova na kikōkeji myaka mivule bapalukanga ku kipwilo? Lelo Leza wibamwene namani? Kino kishinte kisa kulondolola bino bipangujo. Kadi kīsambila pa ñeni yotubwanya kuboila ku muswelo wākweshe Yehova bantu bamo ba mu kitatyi kyāsonekelwe Bible, bāpalukile kwadi mu kitatyi kampanda.
Kishinte kya kwifunda 26: 24-30 Kweji 8, 2020. Yehova usakanga boba bapalukile ku kipwilo bajokele kwadi. Tubwanya kulonga bukomo bwa kukankamika boba basaka kwitaba ku lwito lwa Yehova lwa amba: “Jokelai kondi.” Mu kino kishinte, tusa kwisambila pa muswelo otukokeja kwibakwasha bajokele kwadi.

Kani amaulu ne calo fyalifumine pi? Mba’kasuba, umwensi ne tubangabanga, ne fintu ifingi lukoso ifili pa calo fyalibeleko syani? Baibolo ilasuke’filungeme ili ilabila ati fyalilengelwe na baLesa. Kansi ibuku lyesu lyatatika ne fisimicisyo fya mu Baibolo ifya pa bulengesi.
Tulasambilila ukweba’ti, pa kutanga lukoso baLesa balilengele abantu ba mupasi abali koti nibo. Baali ni nkalamba. Pano icalo calilengelwe pakweba’ti abantu abali koti nifwebo balukwikalamo. Namulifyefyo baLesa balilengele umwalalume ne mwanakasi abailicilwe ati Adama na Efa ne kubabika mwi bala ilyalukuboneka bwino. Pano balikene ukumfwila baLesa kabili balilufisye isyuko lya kulukuli aba mweo.
Ukutatikila apo Adama alengelwe ukufika na ku bulobe bwa menda, yonse lukoso imyaka yali 1,656. Muli yenkeyi’myaka mwalikeleko ne bantu abengi abalukubifya. Mwiulu, mwali ifilengelwe ifya mupasi ifitafibonekapo, Satana ne nkalamba syakwe imbifi. Pa calo , paali Kaini na simbi imbifi ukubikako lukoso ne balalume bamo bamo abakwatisye amakosa. Pano kwaliko ne bantu abalungeme pa calo—Ebeli, Enoci na Noa. Mu Ciputusya ca KUTANGA twakupenda pali bonse aba bantu ne fyacitikile.

Inzya. Muntu ulakonzya kuzwa mumbunga yesu munzila zyobilo:
Kwiinda mukulomba. Kwiinda mukulyaambilila naa kulemba, muntu ulakonzya kutondezya kusala kwakwe kwakuti waleka kuba Kamboni wa Jehova.
Kwiinda mumicito. Muntu ulakonzya kucita zintu zyalo zikonzya kumupa kuteelela kuba akati kabunyina bwesu bwanyika yoonse. (1 Petro 5:9) Mucikozyanyo, ulakonzya kuunka kucikombelo cimbi alimwi akulitondezya kuti uyanda kuzumanana ancico.—1 Johane 2:19.
Mbuti kuti muntu tacikambauki naa kujanika kumiswaangano yanu? Sena muntu ooyo mumubona kuti wakacileka kuba Kamboni?
Peepe, tacili boobo pe. Kucileka kuba Kamboni, naa kulizandula, ciliindene akuba aalusyomo luniini. Kanji-kanji, aabo ibakaunka ansi naa kucileka kuswaangana inga tabalulekede lusyomo lwabo pele balaapenzi lyakutyompwa. Aboobo, muciindi cakubaleka buyo, tulasola kubaumbulizya alimwi akubakulwaizya. (1 Tesalonika 5:14; Juda 22) Ikuti muntu kayanda kugwasyigwa, baalu bambungano balasololela mukupa lugwasyo lwakumuuya.—Galatiya 6:1; 1 Petro 5:1-3.
Nokuba boobo, baalu tabajisi nguzu zyakusungilizya muntu kuti azumanane kuba Kamboni wa Jehova. Muntu uuli woonse ulalisalila mumakani aabukombi. (Joshua 24:15) Tusyoma kuti aabo bakomba Leza beelede kucita oobo cakulisungula, kuzwa aansi amoyo.—Intembauzyo 110:3; Matayo 22:37.

Twatana kuba’mba bantu bavula baji mu bupopweshi batemwa bingi kwisamba pa bya mu Baibolo. Nangwa byonkabyo, twanemeka bingi byaitabilamo bakwetu, kabiji kechi tukanjikizha bantu kutambwila byo tusapwila ne.
Pa kwisamba pa bya bupopweshi, tulondela jifunde ja mu Baibolo jitubula kuba bino na “kukoka muchima
” ne na “mushingi mukatampe.
” (1 Petelo 3:15) Twayuka kuba’mba kechi bonse baswa byo tusapwila ne. (Mateo 10:14) Bino kechi tuyuka usakukana ne usakuswa ne, kanatu panyuma ya kwisamba nanji. Kabiji twayuka ne kuba’mba bwikalo bwa bantu bwaluka aluka.
Nabiji inge muntu wapayankana pa jojo juba, juba jikwabo wakonsha kuswa kwisamba nanji. Kabiji bantu bapita mu makatazho ne mu bintu byakatazha byakonsha kwibalengela kutendeka kutako muchima ku mambo a mu Baibolo. Na mambo a bino, kyo kyo tubwelela ku bantu pa bimye byavula na kukeba kwisamba nabo.

Koku. Bamboni sha baYawe balisumine ati baLesa e balengeshi ba fintu fyonse. Pano tatusuminepo ati icalo calilengelwe mu nshiku 6 kabili ati caikala lukoso imyaka imyanda iinini. Mba nindo? Nipakuti ici cisambisho cilipuseneko na fyefyo Baibolo ilabila. Langulukeni pali fifi ifyakubwenako fibili:
Ubukulu bwa nshiku 6 shesho baLesa bapangilemo icalo. Abasumine ati icalo calilengelwe mu nshiku 6 balalabila ati shilye nshiku shali lukoso sha maawala 24. Pano ishiwi “akasuba” mu Baibolo lilemakaninako iciputusha ca mpimdi iikulu makosa.
—Ifyakutaŋga 2:4; Amasamo 90:4. Imyaka icalo ciikele. Abasumine mu kweba ati icalo calilengelwe mu nshiku 6 balasambisha ati icalo cilikeele lukoso imyanda ya myaka iinini. Nangabefyo, Baibolo ilasambisha ati, icalo ne maulu eko fyali ili inshiku 6 ishi baLesa bapangilemo icalo tashingatatika. (Ifyakutaŋga 1:1) Pakuti pali fyefyo, Bamboni sha baYawe balasumunishako kuli fyefyo basayantisti basangile ati icalo cipale cilikele amabilyoni amyaka.
Nangaba’ti Bamboni sha baYawe balisumine ati ifintu fyonse fyalilengelwe lukoso, tatukanapo fyonse ifi basayantisti balabila. Tulisumune ati Baibolo na sayansi mpindi shimbi filasuminanshanya.

UKUCETEKELA mibelo iicindeme ku baKlistu. Pano talipo ni bonse abali ne kucetekela. (2 Tesa. 3:2) Nangabe’fyo, baYawe balipeele abapyungishi babo bonse “ifya kwesha ifya kucetekela.” (Loma 12:3; Galatya 5:22) Bonse abali ne kucetekela balyelelwe ukulukutoota.
2, 3. (a) Ni esa amashuko umuntu uuli ne kucetekela angalitemwesha? (b) Ni fisa fyakwipusha twakwambaa
...

Apa wanda wa kusyalikizyako amanguzi, Yesu watenzi umu muputule na atumwa yakwe. Lyene papa kwene wapekinye ukuti yazevye, ayanena nu kuti: “Mwacita cii ku kunjiusya.” Yaali nu kulakongana pamwi ku kwiusya imfwa ino wali nu kufwa pakuti antu yakakululwe.

Ya Nte Yakwe Yeova yakumwama ukuti mukalongane nayo ku Ciusyo cii icicindame cuze. Mulasambilila vino umi wakwe Yesu ni mfwa yakwe vingamwavwa.
Cintu cii cilacitikila mupipi na kuno muyelile, nupya kutalaya ukulipila.

1. Kani icebo icakufuma kuli baLesa cindo?
BaLesa balafwaya abantu ukulukwikala abasangalele pa calo. Baalilengele icalo na fyonse ifilimo ni pakuti balitemenwe abantunshi. Bukumo lukoso bakacita ifikalengesha abantu bonse pa calo ukwikala bwino kuntangiile. Bakafumyapo fyonse ifilengesha abantu ukupenga.—Pendeni Jelemiya 29:11.
Takulipo ubuteko ubukonseshe ukufumyapo bumbifi, amalwashi, ne mfwa. Pano kuli icebo iciweme. Bukumo, ubuteko bwa baLesa bukapyana ukuteka konse ukwa bantunshi. Abantunshi bakalitemwesha ubutende ne mweo uuweme.—Pendeni Yisaya 25:8; 33:24; Danyeli 2:44.
2. Mba nindo icebo iciweme cicindamine buno bukumo?
Ukupenga kukashila lukoso ili baLesa bakonala abantu ababipile pa calo. (Sefaniya 2:3) Pano ico ni lwisa cikacitika? Amashiwi abaLesa aalishimikile pa fintu ifipensha abantunshi pali iino mpindi. Ifilukucitika pali ino mpindi filalangisha ukweba ati bukumo lukoso baLesa bakashilisha ukupenga.—Pendeni 2 Timote 3:1-5.
3. Kani findo twelelwe ukucita?
Tulyelelwe ukusambilila pali baLesa ukufuma mu Mashiwi abo, Baibolo. Ili koti ni nkalata batulembeele bawishifwe ababutemwe. Ilatubuula ifitungekala bwino pali ino mpindi kabili na fyefyo ifitungaba ne shuko lya kwikala umuyayaya pa calo. Fya cine, abantu bambi tabakatemwapo kani babona ati mulukusambilila Baibolo. Pano pakuti baLesa balatulaya ati tukalukwikala bwino, tatwelelwepo ukumfwila abantu bambi kani batukaanya ukusambilila.—Pendeni Ifisimpi 29:25; Ukufisulula 14:6, 7.

(Ñi 36:9; Kus 4:11) Ino, kuzumbija mutyima pa būmi bwa difuku ne difuku mu ino ntanda mibi, kubwanya kwitulengeja bukidi bonka tutūle bintu bya ku mushipiditu kunyuma. Gospel Tract and Bible Society
Mwaiseni ku Gospel Tract and Bible Society. Ukukabila ukukalamba kwa ba Gospel Tract and Bible Society kwa kwaakana ne sonde Imbila Nsuma ya Ipusukilo ku kutemwa, ukupitila mu cicetekelo ca muli Yesu Kristu, no kwafwilisha ukufikilisha icipope ca kwa Kristu.
Bushe uli muntu wansansa? Nangu ubulanda no mwenso fila cimfya insansa shobe shonse? Mulatontonkanya ukufumyapo ubulanda bwenu, lelo munshilanshi? Kuti mwalanguluka, “Bushe ine nka kwatapo insansa na kabili?”
Yesu atweba ukuti impongolo sha kumũlu shaliisalikwa kuli ifwe kano fye twafyalwa icipya. E ico, tuleipusha: We cibusa, bushe walifyalwa icipya? We munyinane, icipya? Nga tefyo, ninshi, waliluba. Pantu Yesu alanda, “Ngo muntu tafelwe icipya, te kuti amone ubufumu bwa kwa Lesa” (Yohane 3:3).
Kuti mwaipusha, “Bushe ulufyalwa cipya ninshi?” Lelo kwaliba amasambilisho ayapusana-pusana pa kufyalwa icipya Te lubatisho, pantu bambi balibatishiwe lelo tabafyalwa cipya (Imilimo yabatumwa 8:18-25). Te kwiingila mu cilonganino, pantu bamo balisokelelwe (Abena Galatia 2:4). Te mukulyako umukate, pantu bamo ba lilya ukabulo mucinshi no kuba twala kupupingushi (1 Abena Korinti 11:29). Te mukubukulusha kukwesha ukwikala bwino, “pantu abengi bakafwayo kwingila, lelo bakafilwa” (Luka 13:24). Te kupepa, pantu Yesu alanda, “Aba bantu banshinshimuna patunwa twabo, lelo imitima yabo yataluka kuli ine” (Mateo 15:8).

MAY 20, 2015
UNITED STATES
Bakamonyi ba kwa Yehoba mu NEW YORK basakutendeka kushonkena kutanshi kwa “Londelainga Yesu!” Kushonkena mu United States ku katendeka pa Kitanu lukelo pa 22 May mu 2015. Kuno kushonkena ko bakabulanga kulipilisha mali kukekalako kumpelo ya mulungu mu mapunzha apusana pusana 11 kubikapotu ne mu kishimikwa kyaya lulumbi kya Stanley Theater kuji mu Jersey City, New Jersey (lead photo). Bakamonyi babena kuketekela bantu 41,000 kutanwa ku kuno kushonkena kukekela mu mapunzha 11 apusana pusana.
Ba J. R. Brown, bambilako Bakamonyi ba kwa Yehoba pa ofweshi mukatampe wa ntanda yonse mu Brooklyn New York, baambile’mba: “Bonse baswile kutambula tupepala twa kwiya na kushonkena mu mapunzha mo bekala bakebatambwila bingi, kabiji twaketekela kuba’mba bakatemwa bingi inge batanwako. Kushonkena kwa ‘Londelainga Yesu!’ Pa kuno kushonkena kwa moba asatu kukekala majashi awama bingi aamba pe Yesu byo afunjishanga, akakwasha bantu bonsetu baji na mafumbi apusana pusana kabiji babena kwikala bwikalo bwapusana pusana.”
Kisalo kyonse kufika ne mu January mu 2016, Bakamonyi ba kwa Yehoba bakekala na kushonkena 5,000 kwa “Londelainga Yesu!” Kuno kushonkena kukekala mu byalo 92. Uno mutanchi ye banengezha ku Jibumba Jitangijila ja Bakamonyi ba kwa Yehoba ukekalako yense nangwa lubaji lumo mu milaka 347, kubikapotu ne milaka 55 ya kwamba na maboko.

OPOLISI ya Namibia oya kwata po aniwa aakwiita yamwe shi na sha neyako po lyiikulya yoshikukuta pOkamba yAakwiita po Rundu, Ehangano Egameni lyUuthemba wOmuntu/National Society for Human Rights (NSHR), osho lya popi.
NSHR okwa ti oonzo dhomauyelele dhi shi okwiinekela (mwa kwatelwa yimwe yi ili oshilyo shaakonakono yomonanguwi, odhe shi koleke kutya Opolisi oya kwata po aakwiita yahamano mOmaandaha shi na sha noshinima shika.Mokati kaakwiita mboka ya kwatwa po omu na aniwa Ooshisande yaali naakwiita ye na ooranka dhopevi ye li yane. NSHR okwa yo oye na omadhina gawo nosho wo omayelelel galwe agehe gawo.NSHR okwa ti aafekelwa mbaka ngashiingeyi oye li taya pulwa kakwiita aakuluntu pOkamba yAakwiita pOshaanda, manga inaya gandjwa kOpolisi. Oshiwike sha zi ko,Oshifokundaneki shimwe shomoshilongooshali sha lopota kutya omagumbo ge li 6 000 lwaampoka moshitopolwa sha Kavango, oga li ga thigwa kage na iikulya yoshikukuta sho aniwa iikulya mbika ya yakwa po.Ihe Omuprimaminista Nahas Angula okwa li a popi kutya omagumbo ogendji oga mana po iikulya yoshikukuta molwashoka mboka haya topola iikulya mbika, oya li ya dhini omwaalu gwomagumbo ngoka ga pumbwa iikulya. NSHR okwa ningi eindilo kOpolisi ya Namibia ya konakona meendelelo oshinima shika etayi gandja wo olopota yoshizemo shomakonakono gawo mu shika koshigwana.

Mambo ka o twafwainwa kulombela kwi Lesa?
Yehoba Lesa ukeba amba tulombenga kwi aye kimye kyonse ne kumubula bibena kwitukatazha. (Luka 18:1-7) Uteleka ku byo tumulomba mambo witutemwa. Twafwainwa kulombanga kimye kyonse kwi Shetu wa mwiulu mambo byobyo etukambizha.—Tangai Filipai 4:6.
Kechi twafwainwa kulombangatu inge tubena kukeba bukwasho ne. Lulombelo lwitukwasha kufwenya kwipi ne Lesa. (Salamo 8:3, 4) Umvwe ke tubuule Lesa biji ku muchima kimye kyonse, bulunda bwetu ne aye bukakosa.—Tangai Yakoba 4:8.
Twakonsha kulomba byepi?
Lesa kechi ukeba kubwezhabwezhapo byambo nangwa kwingijisha byambo bya kwimwesha pa kulomba ne. Kabiji kechi twafwainwa kulondela byuba bamo amba bafwainwa kwikala nangwa kufukama pa kulomba ne. Yehoba witukambizha kumulomba kufuma panshi ya muchima. (Mateo 6:7 ) Kyakumwenako, Hana wajingako kala mu kimye kya bena Isalela walombele kwi Lesa pa lukatazho lo ajinga nalo mu kisemi. Lukatazho byo lwapwile, wasanchijile Lesa kupichila mu lulombelo lwa kufuma panshi ya muchima.—Tangai 1 Samwela 1:10, 12, 13, 26, 27; 2:1.
Ke kintu kyawama bingi kwisamba ne Lesa. Twakonsha kubuula Mulenga wetu byonse bitukatazha. Twakonsha ne kumutakaika ne kumusanchila pa bintu byo etubila. Kechi twafwainwa kulengulula jino jishuko jo tuji najo ja kulomba kwi Lesa ne.—Tangai Salamo 145:14-16.

VINO BAIBOLO IKASAMBILIZYA AEVI:
‘Ansansa ayayo aakauvwa izwi lyakwe Leza nu kulisunga!’—Luka 11:28.
CILAYA ULI NDI MUKUSUNGA IZWI LYAKWE LEZA?
Mulaatemwana sana.—Efeso 5:28, 29.
Mulaacindikana sana.—Efeso 5:33.
Mulaaya nu mutende wa cumi.—Mako 10:6-9.
UZYE I CUMICUMI TUNGAZUMILA VINO BAIBOLO IKASAMBILIZYA?
Ee, ivintu vili ivingalenga tuzumile aevi:
Leza ali Katandika wa lupwa. Baibolo ikasambilizya ukuti Yeova Leza aliwe wapeela ‘indupwa zyonsi . . . amaziina.’ (Efeso 3:14, 15) Umu mazwi yauze, tungati ulupwa lwayapo pano Yeova u walenzile ukuti luyeko. U mulandu ci uno cacindamila ukumanya icisinka cii?
Mutale mwelenganye pali cii: Ndi cakuti mwalile ivyakulya ivilyompe, vino yelike ningo sana, nupya mukulonda ukumanya vino yavyeliike, a weni wino munguzya? Uzye asi a wiiya kwene uwavyeliike?
I cilicimwi kwene nu kumanya ivyakucita pakuti umu lupwa mwalukuya insansa, tufwile ukuvwa kuli Yeova wino walenzile ukuti indupwa ziyeko.—Ukutendeka 2:18-24.
Leza akamusakamala cuze. I ca mano ukuti indupwa zyauvwa kuli vino Yeova akasambilizya ukupitila muli Baibolo. U mulandu ci? “Pano wene akamusakamala.” (1 Petulo 5:6, 7) Yeova akalonda ukuti mwaya sana ni nsansa—na vino akatusambilizya vikatwazwa lyonsi!—Amapinda 3:5, 6; Ezaya 48:17, 18.
VWILINI MUNGATI ULI?
Uzye mungacita uli pakuti muye iya musuma, umuci musuma, nanti umuvyazi musuma?
Baibolo ika-asuka icuzyo kwene cii pali EFESO 5:1, 2 na pali KOLOSE 3:18-21.

Ee, Inte sha kwa Yehova balasumina umuti kabili balasumina no kubondapa. Nangu ca kuti tulasunga bwino imibili yesu kabili tulafwaya ukuba no bumi ubusuma, limo tulalwala kabili tulakabila ‘uwa kutundapa.’ (Luka 5:31) Na kuba, ba Nte bamo ni badokota nga filya fyali Umwina Kristu Luka, uwaliko mu nshita sha batumwa.—Abena Kolose 4:14.
Inshila shimo ishakundapilamo shilapusana na mafunde ya mu Baibolo, kabili tatusumina ukundapwa kwa musango yu. Ku ca kumwenako, tatusumina ukutubikamo umulopa pantu Baibolo yalikaanya ukubomfya umulopa pa kuti tupusushe ubumi. (Imilimo 15:20) Na kabili, Baibolo yalikaanya inshila shakundapilamo umwabimbwa ifya mipashi.—Abena Galatia 5:19-21.
Lelo inshila ishingi ishakundapilamo tashipusana na mafunde ya mu Baibolo. Kanshi cila muntu alingile ukuisalila ifyo alefwaya. Nte umo nalimo kuti asumina ukumundapa ukubomfya inshila imo, e lyo umbi nalimo kuti akaana ukumundapa ukubomfya nshila imo ine.—Abena Galatia 6:5.

Mu mafunde baLesa bapeele abaIshilaeli, baalibuulishishe ifi umuntu angaliswesha umwine neli ifintu fimbi ifili koti fiko ifyalukufuma mu mubili, amanata, ne kwikata umuntu umufwile neli inama iifwile. Nakabili, baalibuulishishe ifyakucita pa kufumyapo ifiko. Ukupeelo’mulambu, ukuwasha, neli uku
... 
fyo cingalengesha bambi ukuba aba fiko, ifipe neli ifintu ifingaba ifya fiko, eli na mu kupelako, ifyalukupengelwa pa kusweshiwa.”
Abapate ba baYesu balipwishe baYesu ati: “Mba nindo abasambile benu tabendelapo koti ni fyopele’fyo ifyakutantaka fya bakulu, sombi balalya ifyakulya fyabo ku minwe ibipile?” (Mako 7:5) Abo abapate ba baYesu tabaalukulabilapo ati ukulye’fyakulya ne minwe ya fiko kungalengesha umuntu ukulwala. Sombi, lyali lifunde ku basambishi ati ili tabangalya ifyakulya, umuntu aly
...
su baalibuulishishe mu nshila iipubile ifi baalukubona aya amafunde abantunshi bapangile. Balibuulile isho intangishi sha mapempelo ati: “Cine, Yisaya alishimicile bwino ifya kuli mwebo, mwe bakutumpaika, koti ni fyopele’fyo ifyalembelwe ati: Abantu aba balandemya nebo ku milomo, sombi imitima yabo ili apatali pali nebo [baYawe]. Sombi uko ukundemya nebo kwalukoso, ili bafisambisha koti mafunde ifyakutantaka fya bantu. Mulaleka’mafunde abaLesa, ne kwikatisha ifyakutantaka fya bantu.”—Mako 7:6-8.

Uzye mungatemwa ukumanya icumi pa angeli—vino yaya, vino cali pakuti yayeko, na vino yakaomba? Kusi kuze kuno mungazana masuko ku mauzyo yaa kuluta pa masuko aaya Umwi Zwi lyakwe Leza Baibo. (2 Timoti 3:16) Uzye Baibo ikatuuli?
Viivi kwene vino Leza umupasi, angeli nayo kwene i mipasi isyaloleka nupya yatakwata “munyefu na mafupa.” Angeli ya cumi yakaikala ukwi yulu nupya yakauvwila utunguluzi wakwe Leza.—Luka 24:39; Mateo 18:10; Yoane 4:24.
Insita zimwi angeli yalolekelanga uku yantu mu mili ya
... 
yalolekelanga umu musango wa onsi, kuli aliyo kutaya upusano wakuti wi umonsi nanti a mama. Yene yasitwala nanti ukuvyala ana. Nupya, yatatala yayapo antunze pano nsi—wakwe ukuya ana, ance, nanti sile aikolo. Yeova u wayaumvile; acino na Baibo ikayamila ukuti “ana yakwe Leza.”—Yobo 1:6; Masamu 148:2, 5.
Baibo ikalanda ukuti kwaya “indimi zya antu nga ni zya angeli,” ukulangilila ukuti ni viumbwa vya mupasi kwene vyakwata ululimi na mazwi yano vikaomvya. Nanti icakuti Yeova waomvyanga angeli pa k
...
upya yacenjela wakwe cimwi. Yakapitisya sana ukuluta na vino swe yantu tungelenganya.—Masamu 103:20; Danieli 9:20-23.
Nanti icakuti yamanya sana ivingi pali Leza, angeli yakwata umwakupelela, nupya kwaya ni vintu vimwi vino yatamanya.—Mateo 24:36; 1 Petulo 1:12.
Angeli yaumvilwe ukuya ni miyele isuma, alino na maka ya kuisoolwela cino yakulonda ukucita. Wakwe, vino swe yantunze twaya, nayo kwene yakaisolwela icisuma ni cipe. Caulanda icakuti, angeli yamwi yasoolwilepo ukupondokela Yeova.—Yuda 6.

Twasika Munsaa Mamanino! Twaanjila Sunu Mapenzi Aatanabwenwe!
Mwanaangu mutaanzi kuzyalwa, wakalaa nsoni kapati. Ncobeni nobantu kufumbwa kuti yebo naa walanga mubbuku lipandulula mabala ncolyaamba ibbala lyakuti “nsoni”, inga eelyo bbala kalipandulula zina lini mbwaakabede mwana ooyo! Mukubaa coolwe, batumbu bangu bakabala cimwi cibalo cakali kupandulula buvwuntauzi bwabana oobo bwakatolede busena aciindi cimwi; eeco cibalo cakali kwaambilizya kuti aabo bantu “balaa nsoni”, mbantu bakatazyidwe 
... 
iganta aatalikila “ciindi camapenzi aatanabwenwe.”
Eeco cishinshimi, citondeka mwaka wini, cilaa mulimo mupati kubantu bokwa Yahuwah. Bulelo bwa Ottoman oobo bwakasika kumamanino mu 1922, bwakali bulelo bwa Mwami wa Kunyika naakasika kumamanino aabulelo bwakwe kakwiina muntu wakumuyavwa kulwana basinkondonyina. Eeci ncecintu ciyumya kutondezya kakwiina kudonaika kuti lino swebo tuli muciindi camapenzi ncobeni. Eeci cishinshimi cilaa mulimo munzila zitobela:
1. Kuzuzika cishinshimi eeci, akuganta
...
 kataninga fwa, kuti apandulule bweende bwazintu kusikila kumamanino, Walo wakapa buyo majwi aakulwaizya akwaamba kuti, “Lino eezi zintu zyaakutalika kucitika, amulungumike mitwe yanu kujulu, nkaambo lwaanguluko lwenu lwaaswena afwaafwi. ” (Luka 21:28)
Lino tuli buyo kaindi kasyoonto kuti tusike akataa masiku. Mamanino asika mwanookwesu, alaafwaafwi kapati kwiinda mboyeeyela.

Ee. Twazumila muli Yesu uwalanzile ukuti: “Nene ndi nzila ni cumi nu umi. Pasi umwi angiza kuli Tata suka wizila muli nene.
” (Yoane 14:6) Twakwata utailo uwakuti Yesu wafumile ukwiyulu aiza pano nsi nupya wapeezile umi wakwe uwali umalilike ukuya impolelwa. (Mateo 20:28) Imfwa yakwe Yesu nu kututuluka kwakwe vilalenga ukuti yonsi aamutaila yace yaye nu umi wa pe. (Yoane 3:16) Nupya twazumila nu kuti, ndakai Yesu akuteeka umu Wene wakwe Leza uwa kwiyulu uno likwene wasya ulete umutende umu nsi yonsi. (Umbwilo 11:15) Lelo, twamanya ukuti Yesu ataalingana na Leza, pano umweneco walanzile ukuti: “Tata andusile.
” (Yoane 14:28) Fwandi, tusipepa Yesu, nupya tutazumila ukuti Yesu a Leza Uwa Maka Yonsi.

Kubelesya zina lya Leza. Basikumwaya ma Bbaibbele bamwi baalilwa kumulemeka Sikwaanza Bbaibbele. Mucikozyanyo, busanduluzi bumwi bwa Bbaibbele bulijisi mazina ainda ku 70 aabantu bakagwasyilizya mumu

nguna. Mucikozyano, Bbaibbele limwi lyaamba boobu kujatikizya lugwalo lwa Matayo 7:
13: “Amunjile mumulyango uusyanikide, nkaambo mulyango uutola kuhelo ulikwazeme alimwi nzila iitola nkuko njuubauba.” Nokuba boobo, mwaambo wakusaanguna ubelesya bbala lyakuti “lunyonyooko” kutali “helo.” Ambweni basanduluzi bakabelesya bbala lyakuti “helo” akaambo kakusyoma kuti basizibi bayoopenzegwa kukabe kutamani mumulilo wahelo. Kweelana aliina lyakwaamba ayi Ŋanda ya Bwaami ncoyaamba, shintu shoonse nshetwiiya shilaamba sha Bwaami bwakwe Lesa—mutwi wamakani Yesu ngakalinga kushimikila.—Luka 8:1.
Ngumusena bantu nkobapaila Lesa wancine. Ngumusena Bakamboni Bakwe Yehova mpobatalikila ncito yabo yakushimikila makani abotu aBwaami. (Mateyo 24:14) Maanda aBwaami alipusenepusene kukomena alimwi ambwakayakwa, sombi oonse aliyakitwe munshila yabulemu alimwi aanji alasebenseshekwa amabungano aanji. Mukwiinga mabungano atooya ci
... 
aali na apekwa kuswa mumabungano apusenepusene alatolwa kuofesi yamusampi kwaamba ayi akasebenseshekwe kuyaka na kubamba Maanda aBwaami kumabungano batacite.
Alayakwa aBakamboni balyaaba kusebensa cakutalipilwa. Mushishi shiinji muli Tubunga twa Beshikuyaka Maanda aBwaami. Abo basebensa mutubunga utu balaya mukucafwilisha mabungano apusenepusene mucishi mobakala alimwi amisena imwi kuyaka Maanda aBwaami. Mushishi shimwi kuli bamakwesu bakapekwa ncito yakutanjilila ncito yakuyaka Maanda aBwaami a

Ino ngumulandunshi tuleeta musena nkotupailila ayi Ŋanda ya Bwaami?
Ino tulacikonsha buyani kuyaka Maanda aBwaami pacishi coonse?
AMWIILEWO ASHIMWI
INO MBAANI BATOOCITA KUYANDA KWAKWE YEHOVA MUNSHIKU SHINO?

Inte sha kwa Yehova balasambilila Baibolo na bantu abalefwaya kabili balasuka amepusho pamo nga aya:
Bushe Lesa nani?
Bushe Lesa alansakamana?
Kuti nacita shani pa kuti mu cupo candi mube insansa?
Kuti nacita shani pa kuti imbe ne nsansa??
Pe samba pali amasuko ku mepusho abantu bepusha sana pe sambililo lya Baibolo.
Bushe musambilila shani Baibolo na bantu? Tulasala amalyashi ya kusambililapo pamo nga pali “Lesa” nelyo pa “cupo.” Lyena tulabelenga amalembo ayalekanalekana ayakumine ilyashi tusa
... 
shi Baibolo Isambilisha? Ici icitabo calilondolola bwino bwino ifyo Baibolo ilanda pali Lesa, pali Yesu, pa fyo ifintu fikaba ku ntanshi e lyo na pa malyashi na yambi.
Bushe ni shinga balipilisha pa kusambilila Baibolo? Tabalipilisha nakalya, ne citabo ca kubomfya pa kusambilila na co cine bapeela fye.
Ma-awala yanga mupoosa pa kusambilila Baibolo na bantu? Abengi abasambilila Baibolo na ifwe bafwaya tulesambilila mwi awala limo nelyo ukucilapo cila mulungu. Lelo inshita ya kusambilila tayapimwa
...
kakumanine kabili pa nshita mukafwaya mwe bene. Nga aisa, akamulanga ifyo tusambilila Baibolo mu mamineti fye ayanono. E lyo nga mwatemwa, kuti mwatwalilila.
Bushe nga nasumina ukulasambilila Baibolo, ninshi mfwile ukuba Inte ya kwa Yehova? Awe. Fwe Nte sha kwa Yehova twalitemwa ukusambilisha abantu ifya mu Baibolo, lelo tatubapatikisha ukuti balepepa na ifwe. Tubalondolwela fye ifyo Baibolo yalanda, twalishiba ukuti cila muntu alikwata insambu sha kusala ifyo alefwaya ukusuminamo.—1 Petro 3:15.

Myanda ya Yediko ibazambalala ne ku mizo mikwabo ya mu Kenani. Balopwe ba ino mizo, abasake kwiitabila bakalwe na bene Isalela. Inoko bene Ngibeone abo bākwete’ko mulangwe mwishile. Bāvwele bisandi bisasamuke, bāenda kudi Yoshua kebanena’mba: ‘Tutambanga ku ntanda ya kulampe. Twaivwene myanda ya Yehova ne byonso byaemulongēle mu Edipito ne mu Moabu. Mwitutyipilei amba kemuketutambepo divita, kadi tukekala bengidi benu.’
Yoshua wēbakulupile wāitabija’mba kakebatambepo divita. Mafuku asatu pa kupita’po, Yoshua wāyuka’mba kebatambilepo ku ntanda ya kulampe. I batambe mu ntanda ya Kenani. Yoshua wāipangula bene Ngibeone amba: ‘Mwanda waka mwetubepele?’ Nabo bālondolola’mba: ‘Twakwetwe moyo! Tuyukile amba Yehova Leza wenu wimulwilanga. Bine, kemwaketwipayai.’ Yoshua wālamine mulao wāebalaile, wāleka kwibepaya.
Mafuku pa kupita’po, balopwe batano bene Kenani ne bibumbo byabo bya divita bāzakaja bene Ngibeone. Yoshua ne kibumbo
kyandi kya divita bāendele bufuku bonso butuntulu mwanda wa kukakūla bene Ngibeone. Lubanga na futwi bāshilula kulwa divita. Bene Kenani bāanza kunyemena ku mitamba yonso. Konso kobādi banyemena, Yehova wēbanokejeje’ko mabwe a mvula. Kupwa, Yoshua wālomba Yehova emike dyuba. Mwanda waka wālombele Yehova emike dyuba, adyo dintu dyādi kedyaimene difuku nansha dimo? I mwanda Yoshua wādi ukulupile Yehova. Dyuba kēdyashetukilepo mu bula bwa difuku dituntulu, kufika’nka ne byobānekenye balopwe bene Kenani ne bibumbo byabo bya divita kudi bene Isalela.

Esquema: Jacob, Joseph, Moses. 24 sections. It has a picture book to go along with the recording.
Este guión es una guía básica para la traducción y grabación en otros idiomas. Debe ser adaptados a diferentes culturas e idiomas para que sea relevante a cada área donde se utiliza. Kale saana, ifyuuni fyalilongene. Fyaleefwaya ukukwata imfumu nga bantu neenama. Cuuni nshi caali nookuba imfumu?
"Kapumpe wamaka eulingile ukuba imfumu!" efyatiile icuuni cimo. "Awe kapumpe teeti abe mfumu. Kabili nga aita omfwika kwati aleeilishanya," efyasosele icuuni cimbi. "Mwakatala! Pantu mukulu kabili alaabuluma kwati ninkalamo," efyalandile icuuni nacimbi. "Iyo. Tapupuka. Imfumu yafyuuni ilingile ukupupuka."

MU BIBLE mudi mukanda utelwa bu Luta. I mānga ya kisaka kimo kyādi’ko mu kitatyi kyādi Isalela na batyibi. Luta i nsongwakaji wa mu ntanda ya Moabu; ke wa mu Bene Isalelapo muzo wa Leza. Inoko Luta pa kuyuka Yehova Leza wa bine, waikala kumusanswa bininge. Naomi i mununu mwana-mukaji wakwasha Luta ayuke Yehova.
Naomi i Mwine Isalela. Aye ne wandi mulume ne bandi bana bana-balume babidi bāvilukīle ku ntanda ya Moabu pātyepele bidibwa mu Isalela. Kupwa difuku dimo mulumya Naomi wāfwa. Mwenda mafuk
... 
a kudila, mwanda badi basenswe Naomi bininge. Abanena’mba: ‘Mhm! Batwe twenda nobe ku bantu bobe.’ Ino Naomi webalondolola’mba: ‘Jokai bana bami. Kikekala kiyampe kushikata ku mobo enu.’ Penepo Olepa waanza kujokela kwabo. Ino Luta wapele.
Naomi waalamukila kwadi kamunena’mba: ‘Olepa wajoka. Ne abe nobe joka nandi pamo.’ Ino Luta walondolola’mba: ‘Kokanena’mba nkushiye! Ndeke ñende nobe. Koenda nami ye konkenda, kokekala ye konkekala. Bantu bobe bakekala bami bantu, ne Leza obe ukekala Leza wami
...
ampe. Nemuyuke mowashidile shobe ne inobe, ne ntanda yobe ne mowaidile kushikata umbukata mwa bantu bokwayukile kashā. Yehova ekale nobe!’
Ebiya Luta walondolola’mba: ‘Mfumwami, wi muyampe kondi. Ubaunsenge pa mutyima na kwisamba biyabiya kondi.’ Boaza wasanswa Luta bininge, kadi kepejijepo, abesonge. Naomi wasangala! Kadi Naomi wasangala bininge pa kwikala Luta ne Boaza ababutula mwana mwana-mulume utelwa bu Obeda. Mwenda mafuku, Obeda waikala nkambo wa Davida, otukesambila’po bivule kumeso’ku.

1. (a) Findo fyacitikile kuli Petilo ili kwali icipuupu icikulu pa Cishiba ca Galili? (Boneni icikope icili peulu.) (b) Mba nindo Petilo atatikiile ukwibila?
BUMBI bushiku, Petilo ne basambile bambi baali mu bwato pa Cishiba ca Galili. Balikatashiwe ukwabuka ni pakuti kwali icipuupu icikulu. Ili ifi fyalukucitika, balibwene baYesu balukwenda peulu pa cishiba. Petilo alibilikishe kuli baYesu ati bamwite ukuya kuli
... 
 ati ukucetekela kucindeme pa kufitulukila bambi. Ili baYesu babuulile abasambile babo ukulukufitulukila na baabo abalukubabifya imiku iingi, baalilombele ati: “Mukukushe ukucetekela kwesu.”—Luku 17:1-5.
11. Findo fingatulengesha ukubulo’kusambililako ku kufunda?
11 Kani ndafiitwa ili bamfunda? Mulukubone’nshila mungapyungishishamo uko ukufunda ukucilo’kubonamo ifibipile mu kufunda neli mu muntu uwamufundeni. (Ifisimpi 19:20) Tekweshapo ukupulushe’shuko ilingamofweniko ukutatiko’kulanguluka koti
...
tekela kwenu ukwa kweba ati ifintu fyalilengelwe. Ifi abasambishi benu ne basambile babyenu bangacita fingamukankamikeni.
21. Kani findo baYawe batulaile?
21 BaYawe na baYesu balyofweleko Petilo ukuleko’kukanika ne kutiina. Mu kupita kwa mpindi, Petilo alibele cakubwenako ica kucetekela ukukosele. BaYawe balatofwako na fwebo ukwimakana abakosele mu kucetekela. (Pendeni 1 Petilo 5:9, 10.) Tulyelelwe ukupyungisha pa kukosho’kucetekela kwesu, kabili baYawe bakatushukisha ili tulukucita fyopele’fyo.

MU KĪPI: Kwasha bevwaniki bobe balanguluke, wibakwashe bamone’mba abefunde kintu kya mvubu.
MWA KULONGELA:
-
Tá mutyima ku biyukile kala bevwaniki bobe. Pa kyaba kya kupituluka’tu mu bintu byokebadi kala bevwane, wibakwashe bamone mwisambo na mumweno mupya.
-
Longa bukimbi ne kulanguluka. Shi bibwanika, elekeja milangwe mikatampe na kutela myanda keiyukenepo bininge nansha binkumenkume bya panopano. Langulukila bininge pa myanda ne pa mukwatañenine myanda’ya na myanda yosaka kufundija.
-
Lombola mvubu ya musapu obe. Shintulwila bevwaniki bobe muswelo ubwanya kwibakwasha myanda ya mu Bisonekwa mu būmi bwabo bwa difuku ne difuku. Wisambile pa myanda mipotoloke, pa mwikadilo, ne pa bilongwa bya kamweno ku bevwaniki bobe.

AYA e mashiwi Davidi umwina Israele alandile pa kutasha umwanakashi uo akumenye. Ishina lyakwe ni Abigaili. Cinshi calengele Davidi atashe Abigaili, kabili finshi twingasambilila ku fyo Abigaili acitile?
Davidi akumene no uyu mwanakashi ilyo alefulumuka Imfumu Shauli. Abigaili aupilwe kuli Nabali uwali umukankaala, uwakwete inama ishingi ishaleliila mu calo ca mpili ku kapinda ka ku kulyo aka Yuda. Davidi na baume bakwe “bali kwati lilinga” kuli bakacema ba kwa Nabali na ku mukuni wakwe. Pa numa
... 
ali tayaswike bwino kabili alisaalwile abo Davidi atumine, alikeene no kubapeela ifyo Davidi alombele. E ico Davidi alipekenye ukuyakanda Nabali pa fyo acitile. Nabali no lupwa lwakwe bali no kubakanda pa bupumbu bwakwe.—1 Sam. 25:2-13, 21, 22.
Ilyo Abigaili alwike ifyabipa ifyali no kufuma mu fyo umwina mwakwe acitile, alicilepo fimo. Alombele Davidi ukukacita ifyali no kulenga bucibusa bwakwe na Yehova ukupwa. Kabili alipeele Davidi uwali no kuba Imfumu mu Israele na baume bakwe ifya kulya ifi
...
e ukuba abantu abashitasha pa fisuma ifyo bambi batucitila nga filya Nabali ali. Na kabili nga twamona ifyabipa fyatendeka ukucitika tulingile ukucitapo cimo pa kuti tuficincintile. Kanshi kuti twalanda amashiwi uwaimbile amalumbo alandile ilyo aebele Lesa ati: “Nsambilisheni ubusuma, amano no kwishiba.”—Amalu. 119:66.
Abantu kuti bamona ukuti tuli ba mano nga bamona ifyo tucita. Nampo nga kuti batweba nelyo iyo, nalimo kuti baumfwa nga filya Davidi aumfwile uwatile: “Yabe ayapaalwa amano yobe!”

UWAKUSHIMIKA Danyeli aliko pa calo ninshi kwashala imyaka 500 ukweba ati baYesu bafyalwe. Nangabe’fyo, baYehova baalifisulwile ifyebo kuli Danyeli fyefyo ifyali ne kulenga abantu ukwishiba impindi baYesu bali ne kusufiwa, neli ukusontwa, ukuba baMasaya, neli baKlistu. Danyeli balimubuulile ati: “Pakuti pali fyefyo wisibe ubwenesye ati, ukufuma kukwima kwefunde lyakubusya nekwibakulula Jelusalemi ukufika kuli Masaya, imfumu, pakalukuli imiluŋgu isanu naibili; nemiluŋgu amakumi asa
... 
no twakwata umwaka wa kutatikilapo ukupenda ukushimika kwakwe Danyeli pali Masaya, umwaka wa 455 B.C.E.
Danyeli alibuulishishe ubutali bwa mpindi yopele’yo ifi yali ne kutalimpa pa kufika ku kwisa kwakwe ‘Masaya Imfumu.’ Ukushimika kulashimbula “imiluŋgu isanu naibili [7]; nemiluŋgu amakumi asanu nalimo naibili [imilungu 62],” ukuibambakanya pamo milungu 69. Ni mpindi yakutalimpa shani’yo? Ukwalula kwa maBaibolo aengi kulabuulishisha ati iyi tailipo milungu ya nshiku 7, pano milungu ya myaka. Ic
...
u 1 C.E. pali umwaka umo (takwalipo umwaka wa 0). Kabili ukufuma mu 1 C.E. ukufika mu 29 C.E. pali imyaka 28. Ukusanka pamo aya amanambala (454+1+28) alukutupeela imyaka yonse pamo 483. BaYesu ‘balipinikilwe’ ili bafwile mu mwaka wa 33 C.E., mu mulungu uwa kulenga 70 uwa myaka. (Danyeli 9:24, 26) Boneni ibuuku lya mu Cibemba ilya Angweniko ku Kusesema kwa kwa Daniele! mu capitala 11, mungabona na Insight on the Scriptures, Volume 2, amabula 899-901. Fyonse fyalitulishiwe na Bamboni sha baYehova.

Abo pa kufika ku budimi bwa Ngesemani, Yesu wēbanena’mba: “Shalai pano kadi keshai’nka kukesha.” Kupwa, Yesu wāenda kulampe’ko mu buno budimi, wāfukata manwi panshi. Koku muvutakanibwe ñeni bininge, wālombela Yehova amba: “Kiswa-mutyima kyobe kilongeke.” Penepo Yehova wātuma mwikeulu umo kukankamika Yesu. Yesu pa kujokela kudi batumibwa, w

Niinzi Zyeelelo Zyaampandamunsaka?
Ikkata Lyamulawu wanyika nguumulawu mupati munyika uupandulula mbiiyelede kulelwa nyika. Zyeelelo Zyaampandamunsaka (Declaration of Rights) zijanika muChaandano ChaNe muKkata Lyamulawu wanyika yesu. Chaandano eechi chipandulula zyeelelo antoomwe angwangunuko bantu nzibeelede kujana mubuumi bwabo kakutakwe uubabinda.
Zyeelelo zyabantu ningwangunuko nzibeelede kubaazyo nkaambo kakuti mbantu. Zyeelelo zijanika muZyeelelo Zyaampandamunsaka nzyeelelo zyakasindaminwa
... 
 muntu kuti atajatwi buzike afulumende wakwe, tumwi tubunga antoomwe abamwi bantu bajanika munyika. Zyeelelo eezi kabiyo zizumizya muntu kuti anjile mumabambe aakweendelezegwa kwanyika yakwe kakutakwe uumukasya naakuti kumusaluula.. Mukozyanisyo wazyeelelo zili boobu nzeezi: cheelelo chakupona, cheelelo chakwaangunuka, cheelelo chakutasonsegwa awumwi muntu, ngwangunuko yakwaambuula mbayanda muntu, yakuswaanana abamwi bantu mboyanda/tubunga ntoyanda, angwangunuko yakunjila mumabambe azyameendelez
...
uchitwa abantu antoomwe amilimu yeelede kuchitilwa chisi, zintu ziboneka kazikamantene kabiyo zyeendela aamwi. Muntu woonse ulamulandu wakulemeka zyeelelo zyabamwi antoomwe akuba aamukuli wakutobela akulemeka zyaambwa aKkata Lyamulawu wanyika yaZimbabwe ayimwi milawu iijanika munyika. Nkinkaako zimwi zyeelelo zijanika muZyeelelo Zyaampandamunsaka zilakonzya kutazuzikizigwa muchiindi chimwi kuchitila kuti buumi bwaluundu bube kabotu. Kabiyo eezi zichitilwa kuti zyeelelo zyabamwi bantu tazityolwi.

 mpata. Kadi wibasakilanga bengile na kininga uno mwingilo. Yesu kalañangapo bu bonso bafwaninwe kwingila na bukomo bwa muswelo umo mwingilo wa busapudi waebapa. Monka mokilombwedilwe mu kyelekejo, muntu ne muntu ufwaninwe kulonga “mwendele bukomo bwandi.” Kino ke kilombolapo amba ukasangela muntu “muzoze” ukomenwa kulonga bukomo bwandi bonso mwanda wa kutubulula bintu bya Mfumwandi.
Uno mulao bine keubudilwepo kusangaja batumibwa, waebakulupija amba: “Ense udi na kintu, ukapebwa’ko ne bikwabo”!
